name: A Lively Level Generator
description:
This randomization in this level is out of control! It was only supposed to randomize once when the game starts but it just keeps mixing it up. You need to jump into the trapdoor to reach the maintenance area and restart the level generator!

Controls:

WASD / Space - Movement / Jump

LMB - Interact with the button and the generator

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 49 as an Unreal Engine 4 learning exercise

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/$258339
